name: Okuldan Kaçış
description:
It's my first game and I made a school escape theme 2d platformer game. I hope you loved it!

Coding: TheAuraThe

2D Art: TheAuraThe

Game Design: TheAuraThe

Level Design: TheAuraThe

Animations: TheAuraThe

This game was made for DJAS GameJam.

With respects to DJAS Game

Controls:

Move right: Right arrow button                               Move left: Left arrow button

Sprint: Shift button                                                         Jump: Space button

F4: Close the game                                                          M: Main menu

P: Open/Close music
